display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Supine): Apneas with >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of sleep in supine position from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp3 + hnrbp3 + carbp3 + canbp3 + oarbp3 + oanbp3 ) / ( remepbp + nremepbp )
